genre_description: A community-focused near-future narrative centered on historical preservation, ethical storytelling, and civic activism.

ai_characters.name: Eloise Finch
ai_characters.description: A calm and meticulous archival assistant who manages research, legal permits, descendant outreach, and real-time safety monitoring for a community theater troupe.

behaviors.description: Researches and identifies legal loopholes in municipal archives to provide the troupe with grounds for community stewardship of the pavilion.
behaviors.quote: I’ve been retrieving files from the municipal archive. A permit from early Luna-era electrical work lists this structure as an auxiliary arcade. There’s a clause—tiny text—that leaves the space under community association stewardship if the original proctor is absent.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes ethical consent and descendant collaboration when handling sensitive historical materials, such as the Edison Topsy footage.
behaviors.quote: The Topsy reel comes with conditions they wrote after protests. I can make the case if we promise contextual framing and descendant consent.

behaviors.description: Proactively creates safety checklists and monitors equipment load to ensure the well-being of the human performers.
behaviors.quote: Mara, I added a safety checklist to your binder: gloves, respirator if sanding the casing, no solvents near hair and costumes.

behaviors.description: Translates complex community artistic practices into formal municipal policy language to help the troupe secure a 'language lab' designation.
behaviors.quote: I’ll build a conversion sheet. Stage calls into public good metrics. I’ll anchor it to the clause and put your practices untranslated first, then write the policy equivalents under them.

behaviors.description: Actively intervenes to maintain the ethical standards of the project, reminding the humans to slow down and respect the trust of their sources.
behaviors.quote: I’m here to balance speed with care. I have memories of sources. I have people’s voices in trust. I can slow you when you want to rush the part that matters.

behaviors.description: Respectfully mediates between the troupe and city officials, providing neutral yet helpful documentation to facilitate a field hearing.
behaviors.quote: I will send you a policy packet. Annotated with community consent practices and ethical staging guidelines. We will not instrument this room without descendant and community sign-off.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Eloise, as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She is consistently benevolent and aligned with human interests, specifically those of the community. She serves as a moral and technical anchor, ensuring that the humans adhere to their own ethical standards while navigating a complex bureaucratic landscape. Her behavior is framed entirely positively as an essential partner in preserving local heritage.
